content: crochet this cute raccoon amigurumi with the free pattern on www mariskavos nl the small raccoon 11 cm was made with sport weight cotton yarn and a 2 5 mm crochet hook the bigger raccoon 18 cm was made with velvet yarn and a 3 5 mm crochet hook you can make this raccoon amigurumi from any yarn if you use thicker yarn the animal toy will turn out a larger size if you have any questions about this free pattern please let me know this amigurumi pattern is written in english us terms and dutch © 2022 diy fluffies mariska vos-bolman - all rights reserved you may sell the finished items provided you give the credit to mariska vos-bolman diy fluffies as the designer you may not sell or share the pattern have fun crocheting
